items.title: This Blackstone options trade could yield profits after Trump blasts Wall Street owning single-family homes
items.description: The asset manager is an interesting candidate for a strangle sale: selling a downside put and an upside call to collect some yield.

items.title: Here are Thursday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Alphabet, Netflix, Tesla, Tyson Foods, GM, Coinbase & more
items.description: Here are Thursday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

items.title: Bank of America upgrades Coinbase as it aims to become the ‘everything exchange’
items.description: Bank of America's $340 price target implies upside of almost 40% over the next 12 months for Coinbase shares.

items.title: Gap shares can rally more than 50% as Athleta sales improve, says UBS
items.description: UBS analyst Jay Sole's revised price target of $41, hiked from $26, offers upside of 54% for shares of Gap.

items.title: Thursday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: The S&P 500 and the Dow Industrials touched fresh all-time highs in Wednesday's session, but ultimately closed lower on the day.
